attributes.action: Deport ALL Murderers, Rapists and other Violent criminals to their own country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should law abiding, God fearing citizens of this country be subjected to the criminal activity of immigrants and then forced to keep them in the comfort, safety and warmth of our already over-loaded prisons, send them home!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
